mapper.select: select tb_natres.*,tb_natpoint.nat_pointname,tb_user.user_name from tb_natres ,tb_natpoint ,tb_user where tb_natres.nat_pointid=tb_natpoint.nat_pointid and tb_natres.user_id=#{user_id} and tb_user.user_id=tb_natres.user_id and tb_natres.nat_result is not null order by tb_natres.nat_time desc
mapper.update: update tb_user set user_signcolor=2,sign_timeleft=NOW() where user_id in (select user_id from tb_natres where tube_id=#{tube_id})
mapper.select: select nat_time,count(*) as nat_number from tb_natres where date_sub(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 10 DAY) <= DATE (nat_time) and nat_pointid in (select nat_pointid from tb_natpoint where city_code=#{city_code}) group by nat_time order by nat_time
select count(*) from tb_natres where nat_pointid in (select nat_pointid from tb_natpoint where city_code=#{city_code})
select count(*) from tb_natres where nat_pointid in (select nat_pointid from tb_natpoint where city_code=#{city_code}) and nat_result is not null
select count(*) from tb_natres where nat_pointid in (select nat_pointid from tb_natpoint where city_code=#{city_code}) and nat_result='阴性'

select tb_area.area_code,area_name,count(*) as t_areanat from tb_natres,tb_natpoint,tb_area where tb_natres.nat_pointid=tb_natpoint.nat_pointid and tb_natpoint.area_code=tb_area.area_code and tb_natpoint.area_code=#{area_code} and DATE(nat_time)=CURDATE()

select tb_natres.*,tb_user.user_name,tb_natpoint.nat_pointname,tb_testpoint.tp_name from tb_natres,tb_user,tb_natpoint,tb_testpoint where tb_natres.user_id=tb_user.user_id and tb_natres.nat_pointid=tb_natpoint.nat_pointid and tb_natres.nat_peopleid=tb_testpoint.tp_id and tb_natpoint.city_code=#{city_code}
